item.title: Automatically write Calibrated parameters by SWAT-CUP (model.in) back to SWAT Access database (.mdb)
item.description: 1 Requirement analysis ArcSWAT and QSWAT is the most two popular user interface for SWAT model users. SWAT-CUP has been widespreadly used to calibrate SWAT model which coupled SUFI2, PSO, GLUE, ParaSol, and MCMC procedures. Most users like to work with user-friendly interfaces (i.e., ArcSWAT and QSWAT, with SWATEditor inside) other than original SWAT input and output files (i.e., the TxtInOut folder). Because the latter has a large number of files and is not easy to handle.
